name: Team Up VR (Beta)
description:
Team Up is a virtual reality enabled multiplayer sci-fi shooter game where 6 players are pitted against one another in a 3 vs. 3 match.
Immerse yourself in the world of ultimate war between Terminators and Humans. Choose your hero from different playable characters. Fight and claim your victory in an epic VR death match.Features
  • Dedicated Servers
  • Bots
  • Deathmatch
  • 10 Heros with different weapons and abilities
  • Touchpad locomotion
  • Runs on Vive, Oculus and WMR
  • Different maps with different objectives (Soon)
  • Offline Mode (Soon)
  • Voice Chat (Soon)
